metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25649 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in FasterXML Jackson Databind, where it did not have entity expansion secured properly. This flaw allows vulnerability to XML external entity (XXE) attacks. The highest threat from this vulnerability is data integrity.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25649` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.11.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.11.1-1').
